span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 削弱，破坏： to weaken, injure, or impair, often by degrees or imperceptibly
【例】 undermine a fortress 挖地道破坏堡垒
【近】 undermine, weaken, debilitate, enfeeble, enervate
【反】 strengthen, support, fortify, reinforce 加强

【记】 under mine 在下面挖土，在下面埋地雷
